alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of central Carbon County through 630 PM MDT... At 601 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds over Sinclair, or near Rawlins, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Sinclair, Seminoe Campground, Seminoe Dam and Separation Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 204 and 247. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills
